title: My Wallpaper Gallery v2.5
description:
"My Wallpaper Gallery" This is a very handy application to change your wallpaper on your desktop. You can easily browse throgh the categories and in one click your wallpaper is changed in what you want. You can also set your own wallpaper. goto 'file' - 'set wallpaper from file' you can browse your harddisk now for a wallpaper, select your wallpaper and click on 'open'. Your own wallpaper is now on your desktop.

Homepage: http://www.friendinwar.com/index.php

CHANGELOG:

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.0 (01-02-2014):
* Complete rewrite of the program.
* More wallpapers to choose from.
* No more gallerie downloads, just choose your wallpaper and download him.
* new website with more features and information: http://www.friendinwar.com
* reduced filesize of the complete program.
* New template in the program and installer.

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.1 (05-02-2014):
* Search function on the main program menu.
* Random Auto Wallpaper wil also check for latest program version.
* Quick drop-down menu on the gallerie page to select easely a gallerie.
* The link to 'Auto Random Wallaper' has a different place in the drop-down menu.
* Added a link to the forum in the drop-down menu.
* A couple very small script changes.	

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.2 (08-02-2014):
* You can select a specific category for the random wallpaper (menu -> Settings -> Select random wallpaper category).
* Delete the zero's in a filename 'abstract_1.jpg' instead of 'abstract_0001.jpg'.
* Added a submenu in the 'Space' category called 'Space Digital Art'.
* Added 3 galleries with a total of 24 wallpapers in 'Space Digital Art'.
* Send download information to the server for some statics on the website.
* Some small script changes.
* Better update function in the installer, when you have already a previous version installed.

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.2.1 (15-02-2014):
* Fixed error when you go to 'Search for wallpapers' without a search term.
* Added 2 pages to '3d_digital_art' (Added 18 Wallpapers).

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.3 (22-02-2014):
* Set a minimum of 30 minutes for 'Auto Random Wallpaper' to reduce the server load.
* Delete the old style wallpaper from the server (used by v2.1 and below).
* Deleted the wallpaper of the day (it used the old style wallpapers).
* Make more statics to 'Auto Random Wallpaper' (Counter how many time it runs on a pc).
* Make more statics to 'Galleries' (Counter how many time it runs on a pc).
* Added 3 pages to 'Waterfalls' (Added 27 Wallpapers).

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.4 (01-03-2014):
* Forum popup when you close the program (to promote the website forum)(SORRY).
* Added a 'Did you know' dialog when you start the program with everything that you want to know about the program.
* A button to enable or disable the 'Did you know' dialog.
* A page on the main program with the best downloaded wallpapers on menu->file->best downloaded wallpapers.
* A page on galleries with the best downloaded wallpapers on menu->best downloaded wallpapers.

My Wallpaper Gallery v2.5 (08-03-2014):
* Added a voting system for wallpapers that you put on your screen.
* A dialog to set the voting option 'on' or 'off'.
* Added 2 pages to 'Beaches - Sea' (Added 18 Wallpapers).
* Added 2 pages to 'Animals' (Added 18 Wallpapers).
* Added 2 pages to 'Space' (Added 18 Wallpapers).
